sentences.en: A number of the French players went nuts, completely out of control.
sentences.cn: 有几个法国运动员简直是疯了，完全失去了控制。

sentences.en: A substantial proportion of the population speak a French-based patois.
sentences.cn: 人口中有一大部分说以法语为基础的混合语。

sentences.en: His trial revived memories of French suffering during the war.
sentences.cn: 他的受审重新勾起了在战争中受苦受难的法国人民的回忆。

sentences.en: How do you ask for directions in French?
Hum, I am sorry but I thought you were French.
sentences.cn: 嗯，很抱歉，我以为你是法国人。

sentences.en: In 1970 the average size of a French farm was 19 hectares.
sentences.cn: 1970年，法国农场的平均规模为19公顷。

sentences.en: Last year, he mailed the documents to French journalists.
sentences.cn: 他去年把这些文件寄给了法国记者。

sentences.en: The French, who led 21-3 at half time, scored eight tries.
sentences.cn: 上半场以21：3领先的法国队有8个达阵得分。

sentences.en: The last French king was Louis Philippe, who abdicated in 1848.
sentences.cn: 法国末代国王是1848年逊位的路易·菲力普。

sentences.en: The main investor in the project is the French bank Credit National.
sentences.cn: 该项目的主要投资商是法国的国民信贷银行。

sentences.en: The matter was left in abeyance until Haig saw French.
sentences.cn: 事情被搁置了起来，直到黑格见到法国人。

sentences.en: There were mixed fortunes for French rugby teams on tour.
sentences.cn: 参加巡回比赛的法国橄榄球队成绩有喜有悲。

sentences.en: They rather looked down their noses at anyone who couldn't speak French.
sentences.cn: 他们相当瞧不起不会说法语的人。

sentences.en: They will be in raptures over the French countryside.
sentences.cn: 他们会深深爱上法国的乡村。

sentences.en: This freed the Austrian army to operate against the French.
sentences.cn: 这使得奥地利军队可以对法军作战。

sentences.en: While her English was correct, it was peppered with French phrases.
sentences.cn: 她的英语语法上没错，但是里面夹杂着很多法语短语。

words.tran_cn: 法国的；法语的；法国人的

phrases.tran_cn: 法式生菜调味酱，法式凉菜调味汁
法属圭亚那（位于南美洲北部）
n. 不辞而别，悄悄离去；擅离职守
法属玻里尼西亚（位于大洋洲）
诺曼法语（中世纪诺曼第及英国使用的法语）

trans.tran_cn: 法国的，法国人的，法语的
trans.tran_en: relating to France, its people, or its language
